name: ACCOUNT_RQG_GROUPERS
description: The list of requisition groupers that have charges on the account.

columns.name: ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the guarantor record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: RQG_GROUPER_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for a requisition grouper patient that has charges on the guarantor account.
